Package com.telefonica.cose.provenance

Interface XMLSignatureInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLSignature
public interface XMLSignatureInterface
The interface defines a contract for operations related to signing and handling XML documents. It provides methods for signing a document, saving it to a file, and loading an XML document from a file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.jdom2.Document
    loadXMLDocument(String xmlFilePath)
    Loads an XML document from the specified file path.
    void
    saveXMLDocument(org.jdom2.Document document, String fileName)
    Saves the given XML document to a file with the specified file name.
    String
    signing(String document, String kid)
    Signs the given document using the specified key identifier (KID).

  • Method Details

    • signing

      String signing(String document, String kid) throws Exception
      Signs the given document using the specified key identifier (KID).
      Parameters:
      document - The document to be signed, represented as a String.
      kid - The key identifier used for signing the document.
      Returns:
      A String representing the signature.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the signing process.

    • saveXMLDocument

      void saveXMLDocument(org.jdom2.Document document, String fileName) throws Exception
      Saves the given XML document to a file with the specified file name.
      Parameters:
      document - The XML document to be saved, represented as a JDOM document.
      fileName - The name of the file where the document will be saved.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while saving the document.

    • loadXMLDocument

      org.jdom2.Document loadXMLDocument(String xmlFilePath) throws org.jdom2.JDOMException, IOException
      Loads an XML document from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      xmlFilePath - The path to the XML file to be loaded.
      Returns:
      A JDOM document representing the loaded XML content.
      Throws:
      org.jdom2.JDOMException - If an error occurs while parsing the XML file.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.
